title: Pair of Earrings
description: pair of earrings, each has a cone-like top made from tiers of filigree; one chime hangs down from the center of the filigree cone; a row of dangling peppers(?) hangs from the edge of the filigree; ear piece attaches to a loop at the top center of the cone
creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
